**Daedalus: Crafting the Future of Precision Manufacturing**

Daedalus aims to revolutionize precision manufacturing, and think of it as an AWS for this sector. Founded in 2019 and proudly part of the Y Combinator Batch W20, this startup is on a mission to streamline manufacturing processes with cutting-edge technology.

Although their website seems to indicate some internal issues, Daedalusâ€™s focus is clear: they provide solutions that leverage robotics and facilitate commercial space launches. With a lean team of seven, they are set up to scale with agility and innovation.

Dalton Caldwell, a notable figure in the startup ecosystem, serves as their Group Partner, guiding the company as it navigates the complexities of the manufacturing landscape. While still in its early days, Daedalus is making strides toward redefining how precision manufacturing operates, embedding efficiency and advanced tech into the industry.

With a tag aligning them with 'commercial-space-launch' and 'robotics', Daedalus is clearly positioned at the intersection of two exciting domains. As they continue to develop their offerings, the industry will be watching closely.

For more information, check out their website: [Daedalus](https://daedalus.de).
